fontTheory.description: The typography system for this resume follows a classic yet modern approach, aiming for readability and professionalism.
fontTheory.readability: The combination of Arial for headings and Georgia for body text ensures a comfortable reading experience, especially for longer sections.
fontTheory.hierarchy: Headings are bold and distinct in Arial to establish hierarchy, while body text in Georgia maintains a traditional feel.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial and Georgia complement each other by offering a balance between modernity and timelessness, suitable for a professional document like a resume.
